ygData.subject: Re: Help me!
ygData.msgSnippet: Be warned, most of the people around here seem to be Druids so expect to hear a lot about how great Druids are. YES! Druids rule, lol. =D Anyway,
ygData.messageBody:
"Be warned, most of the people around here seem
to be Druids so expect to hear a lot about how great
Druids are. "<br><br>YES! Druids rule, lol.
=D<br>Anyway, I think you should try the iksar. I've never
played one, but the monks look like they rule. My first
char was a cleric, and I was a *complete* newbie, so I
had no clue what I was doing. Luckily, I quickly made
a good friend (who is now uber, sheesh) and she
helped me out a LOT. Making friends helps a lot. I think
reading up on casters realm or something is a good idea,
but you won't really know what you like until you've
spent time playing. I've found I play healer classes
best, although I recently started a bard and love her,
as well.<br>Best wishes with your adventures in
Norrath.<br><br>~Kanissa Noryk, 35 druid of Norraths Keepers, Rodcet
Nife<br>~Catallus, the super-twinked bard of Prexus
